verses.text: I love Thee, I love Thee, I love Thee, my Lord; I love Thee, my Savior, I love Thee, my God.
I'm happy, I'm happy, O, wondrous account! My joys are immortal, I stand on the mount!
O Jesus, my Savior, with Thee I am blest, My life and salvation, my joy and my rest.
O, who's like my Savior? He's Salem's bright King; He smiles, and He loves me, and helps me to sing.

refrain.text: I love Thee, I love Thee, and that Thou dost know; I'll praise Him, I'll praise Him, with notes loud and clear, But how much I love Thee my actions will show.
